name: Spiked Tagalong Milkshake
description: This is a Girl Scout Cookie-inspired milkshake for grownups only, but you can leave out the booze if you want to make a version for kids.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup chocolate ice cream (about 6 ounces / 2 medium scoops)
2 cups butter pecan ice cream (about 12 ounces / 4 medium scoops)
Garnish: Whipped cream and chopped toasted peanuts

recipeInstructions.text: Add chocolate ice cream, butter pecan ice cream, milk, bourbon, salt, and peanut butter to a blender. Purée until smooth.
Drizzle chocolate syrup on sides of serving glasses. Divide blended milkshake among glasses, top with whipped cream and toasted peanuts.
